briefTitle: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine (13vPnC) in Healthy Children Aged 15 Months to 17 Years
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open Label Trial Evaluating the Safety,Tolerability and Immunogenicity of 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Children Aged 15 Months to 17 Years in the United States
summary: This open-label, multicenter study is designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability and immunogenicity of 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine in healthy children aged more than 15 months up to less than 18 years.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Predefined Serotype-specific Immunoglobulin G (IgG) Antibody Concentration Greater Than or Equal to (â‰¥) 0.35 Micrograms Per Milliliter (Mcg/mL) Measured 1 Month After Vaccination in Group 1 and 2
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 28 to 42 days after dose 2 for Group 1 and 28 to 42 days after dose 1 for Group 2
